items.name: init(leadingFrames: AVAudioFrameCount, trailingFrames: AVAudioFrameCount)
items.desc: Creates a priming information instance with the specified leading and trailing frames.

items.name: var leadingFrames: AVAudioFrameCount
items.desc: The number of leading (previous) input frames the converter requires to perform a high-quality conversion.

items.name: var trailingFrames: AVAudioFrameCount
items.desc: The number of trailing input frames, past the end input frame, the converter requires to perform a high-quality conversion.
